nodes.text: 4724 was a member of Confederacy of Independent Systems. 4724 was stationed at the west end of a CIS mobile command center after General Lok Durd arrived on the planet Maridun during the Clone Wars.

General Lok Durd arrived on Maridun during the Clone Wars, and he brought Separatist forces with him to the world. While on duty on Maridun, 4724 was guarding the west end of a Separatist command center established by the Separatists. Jedi Knights Anakin Skywalker and Aayla Secura, Jedi Padawan Ahsoka Tano, and clone troopers Bly and Rex infiltrated the base, and while there Rex, Bly, and Skywalker took out B1-Series battle droids in a Separatist command center inside as one of the droids in it requested a report from 4724.
